name: tidalrpc
description: Unofficial Discord RPC for Tidal Desktop

scripts.copy:macos: copyfiles --error --up 1 src/assets/*.* dist && cp package.json dist/
scripts.start: pnpm run build && pnpm run copy && electron dist/index.js
scripts.build:win32: tsc && pnpm run copy && electron-builder -c configs/builder/windows.json
scripts.build:ci:macos: tsc && pnpm run copy:macos && electron-builder -c configs/builder/macos.json -p never
scripts.build:ci:win: tsc && pnpm run copy:win32 && electron-builder -c configs/builder/windows.json -p never
